title: Divya Pushpa Haaram: Diamond and Emerald Floral Necklace
features: This modern Haaram features a two-layered floral design. Each flower is meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The pendant showcases a striking Emerald center, surrounded by more diamonds and finished with a lustrous South Sea pearl drop.The gold has a fine Hyderabadi polish.
occasions: and other special occasions. A statement piece ideal for modern brides or as a cherished heirloom. Also suitable for celebratory functions like Seemantham or a grand Diwali celebration.
description: A harmonious blend of contemporary design and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The exquisite combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearl makes this necklace a timeless treasure. This unique piece is both a symbol of heritage and modern elegance, ensuring you stand out with unparalleled grace and sophistication.
